title: Bug 17703 - Edit > Add Task action should use Workbench dialog as Java Editor does
OB: F1: Select a CU in the packages view and execute File > Add Task
EB: Currently, when executing the above actions, a different dialog is displayed compared to executing the action from the Java editor's ruler context menu.
SR: Update the behavior of the Edit > Add Task action in the Workbench view to use the same dialog as the Java editor's ruler context menu.
